dataAnalysis.selectLogToSync: Select a log file to automatically load linked video and sensor data

dataAnalysis.videoStartTimeHint: Set the actual time (HH:mm:ss) corresponding to when the video starts playing, used to synchronize with the timeline of logs and operational data
dataAnalysis.currentVideoStartTimeHint: Displays the currently configured video start time, or "-" if not configured
dataAnalysis.videoTimeConfigHint: Seek video to a key moment, then set the actual time for that frame; the system will infer video start/end and sync with logs
dataAnalysis.currentVideoProgressHint: Progress bar position when the dialog opened, used to infer the actual time for video 0:00
dataAnalysis.currentFrameTimeHint: Set the actual time (HH:mm:ss) for the current progress position, used to sync with logs and operational data

dataAnalysis.motionNotFoundShortHint: No data found for the time period. Cannot add manually.
dataAnalysis.logNotFoundTitle: No log data found for the corresponding time period
